Package org.opends.quicksetup

Interface CliApplication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgressNotifier, Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Uninstaller
    public interface CliApplication
extends ProgressNotifier, Runnable
    Represents a quick setup CLI application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      UserData createUserData​(Launcher launcher)
      Creates a set of user data from command line arguments and installation status.
      ReturnCode getReturnCode()
      Gets the return code to return to the console.
      ApplicationException getRunError()
      Gets any exception that happened while this application was running.

      Gets the user data this application will use when running.

      Sets the formatter that will be used to format messages.
      void setUserData​(UserData userData)
      Sets the user data this application will use when running.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opends.quicksetup.event.ProgressNotifier

        addProgressUpdateListener, notifyListeners, removeProgressUpdateListener

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • createUserData

        UserData createUserData​(Launcher launcher)
                 throws UserDataException,
                        ApplicationException,
                        ClientException
        Creates a set of user data from command line arguments and installation status.
        Parameters:
        launcher - that launched this application
        Returns:
        UserData object populated to reflect the input args and status
        Throws:
        UserDataException - if something is wrong with the data provided by the user
        ApplicationException - if there is an application specific problem
        ClientException - If an error occurs when creating the data.

      • getUserData

        UserData getUserData()
        Gets the user data this application will use when running.
        Returns:
        UserData to use when running

      • setUserData

        void setUserData​(UserData userData)
        Sets the user data this application will use when running.
        Parameters:
        userData - UserData to use when running

      • setProgressMessageFormatter

        void setProgressMessageFormatter​(ProgressMessageFormatter formatter)
        Sets the formatter that will be used to format messages.
        Parameters:
        formatter - ProgressMessageFormatter used to format messages

      • getRunError

        ApplicationException getRunError()
        Gets any exception that happened while this application was running. A null value returned from this method indicates that the execution of the CLI program is not complete or was successful.
        Returns:
        an exception that happened while the CLI was running

      • getReturnCode

        ReturnCode getReturnCode()
        Gets the return code to return to the console.
        Returns:
        return code to return; if null the return code indicated in the error returned by getRunError will be used.
